changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Ajout de la présentation en mode tableau: Addition of the presentation in equipment table mode (Jeedom v4.2
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la page de conf: New presentation of the configuration page
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects in the equipment page
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des co: New presentation of the list of orders
changelog.md.Ajout du support de la géolocalisation c: Added support for geolocation configured in the Jeedom core
changelog.md.Ajout d'un cron d'auto-actualisation per: Addition of a personalized auto-update cron in the equipment config; attention you must reconfigure your equipment because the cron30 is disabled; Otherwise, the refresh of journeys will no longer be carried out automatically
changelog.md.Correction de l'extraction des infos dû: Fixed info extraction due to Waze API change
changelog.md.Amélioration du widget pour jeedom v4: Improvement of the widget for jeedom v4
changelog.md.Correction de bug sur le widget en jeedo: Bug correction on the widget in jeedom v4

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'avoir les infos de tr: This plugin allows you to have the trip info (traffic taken into account) via Waze
index.md.Ce plugin peut ne plus marcher si Waze n: This plugin may no longer work if Waze no longer accepts that we interrogate its site
index.md.Afin d'utiliser le plugin, vous devez le: In order to use the plugin, you must download, install and activate it like any Jeedom plugin
index.md.Suite à cela il vous faudra créer votre: After that you will have to create your trip (s)
index.md.Rendez vous dans le menu plugins\/organi: Go to the plugins / organization menu, you will find the Waze Duration plugin
index.md.Ensuite vous arriverez sur la page qui l: Then you will arrive on the page which will list your equipment (you can have several Routes) and which will allow you to create some
index.md.Cliquez sur le bouton Ajouter un Trajet: Click on the Add Trip button or on the + button
index.md.Vous arriverez ensuite sur la page de co: You will then arrive on the configuration page of your Trip
index.md.Sur cette page vous trouverez trois sect: On this page you will find three sections
index.md.Vous trouverez dans cette section toutes: In this section you will find all jeedom configurations
index.md.A savoir le nom de votre équippement, l': Namely the name of your equipment, the object with which you want to associate it, the category, if you want the equipment to be active or not, and finally if you want it to be visible on the dashboard
index.md.Cette section est une des plus important: This section is one of the most important and allows you to set the starting and ending point
index.md.Ces infos doivent être les latitudes et: These infos must be the latitudes and longitudes of the positions
index.md.Elles peuvent être retrouvées en utilisa: They can be found using the site provided by clicking on the page link (just enter an address and click on get GPS coordinates
index.md.durée aller avec le trajet alternatif: journey time with the alternative route
index.md.durée retour avec le trajet alternatif: return time with the alternative route
index.md.Toutes ces commandes sont disponibles vi: All these commands are available via scenarios and via the dashboard
index.md.Le bouton en haut à droite permet de raf: The button at the top right refreshes the info
index.md.Toutes les infos sont visibles (pour les: All information is visible (for trips, if the trip is long, it can be truncated but the full version is visible by leaving the mouse on it
index.md.Les infos sont rafraichies une fois tout: The information is refreshed once every 30 minutes
index.md.Vous pouvez les rafraîchir à la demande: You can refresh them on demand via scenario with the refresh command, or via the dash with double arrows
